original_text: A man must not cut the hair on the sides of his head. He must not cut the edges of his beard.
korean_text: 머리 가를 둥글게 깎지 말며 수염 끝을 손상하지 말며

sentences.original_text: A man must not cut the hair
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자는 머리카락을 자르지 말아야 한다

sentences.original_text: on the sides of his head
He must not cut the edges
